name: 88 Brand Partners
description:
We build new brands, guide the strategic evolution of existing brands and create meaningful brand experiences through seamless communications across all media. We create and support audience-centric brands by working side-by-side with clients and each other. Together, we go deeper. And the results go further: authentic, powerful brands that support core strategies and achieve business goals.
Based in Chicago, we’ve got Midwestern hearts and global perspectives, which gives clients the best of all worlds—an open, friendly partner who provides fresh solutions informed by smart strategy and killer creative, all within a workflow process that flexes to suit client needs.
READ MORE...
